description: Easy to pack, quick drying and the perfect weight for a convenient mid-layer in warm conditions. High Coast Lite Sweater is made from high-quality sweatshirt fabric in partly recycled polyester that has a nice, cotton-like feel. The inside is Felpha knitted with a loop structure that facilitates moisture wicking. Round neckline and a little zippered pocket in the right seam - perfect for keys, a bank card or other small items you don’t want to risk losing.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Lite Sweater - Mens
